rukus.text: On that Day We will collect from every community a crowd of those who denied Our Signs, paraded in tight ranks
Then when they arrive He will say, ´Did you deny My Signs even though you did not have proper knowledge of them. What were you doing?´
The Word will be carried out against them for the wrong they did and they will not speak
Do they not see that We have made the night for them to rest in and the day for seeing? There are certainly Signs in that for people who have iman
On the Day the Trumpet is blown and everyone in the heavens and everyone on the earth is terrified — except those Allah wills, everyone will come to Him abject
You will see the mountains you reckoned to be solid going past like clouds — the handiwork of Allah who gives to everything its solidity. He is aware of what you do
Those who perform good actions will receive better than them and will be safe that Day from terror
Those who perform bad actions will be flung head first into the Fire: ´Are you being repaid for anything other than what you did?´
´I have simply been ordered to worship the Lord of this land which He has declared sacred — everything belongs to Him — and I have been ordered to be one of the Muslims
and to recite the Qur´an.´ Whoever is guided is only guided to his own good; if someone is misguided just say, ´I am only a warner.´
Say: ´Praise be to Allah. He will show you His Signs and you will recognise them. Your Lord is not unaware of what you do.´
